welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cerritos, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, diverse cuisine, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all that Cerritos has to offer!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and shipping operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Daugherty Field Terminal
terminals.description: The Daugherty Field Terminal is a smaller terminal used for general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Torrance Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a cafe, gift shop, and rental car services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Chino Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private jet travelers and offers exclusive amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Ontario International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The original terminal at Ontario International Airport, currently undergoing renovations.
